attributes.action: Petition to ban the use of mobile phones inside the Houses of Parliament
attributes.additional_details:
A petition for the Government to install a ban on the use of mobile phones and mobile phone equipment whilst Parliament is in session.

We the people find it increasingly frustrating that elected representatives frequently text or play on their mobile phone during House of Commons / Lords sessions.

We ask that should this petition receive the required amount of signatures that it should be brought forward and debated by the house.
